item.title: Problem with making normal client
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

change all the variables to a static

public static int world;
providing the world variable is a integer.
or
public static String world;
providing it is a String.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with making normal client
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

ok this is the error

client.java:4308: non-static method config() cannot be referenced from a static
context
config();
^
Note: * uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

and this is the bit of code that relates 2 it

public void config() {
try{
Properties x201 = new Properties();
x201.load(new FileInputStream("./Settings.ini"));
world = x201.getProperty(“world”);
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
}
